products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

Peel-off lip stain masque that lasts all day. Wonder Blading Peel and Reveal locks in color for a matte nude finish: waterproof, smudge proof so you skip touch-ups through drinks, meals, commutes, and workouts.

And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

products.description: Choco Musk is not just a fragrance; it's a delicate dance of sweet shades that captivates the senses. The delightful aroma begins with the chic allure of white musk, falling under the spell of incomparable white chocolate. Each note in the composition complements the other, creating a harmonious blend that emphasizes without overwhelming. As the fragrance unfolds, the middle notes gently merge, introducing spicy cinnamon, creamy vanilla, and the enchanting essence of rose. The base notes add a touch of oriental mystique, with exciting amber and myrrh weaving together with a noble sandalwood tint. The result is a sweet harmony that plays with shades of dessert perfumes in all their splendor. Choco Musk is a delicacy that transcends seasons, inviting you into a fairy-tale captivity of sweet indulgence. Whether it's the warmth of summer or the coziness of winter, let this fragrance be your year-round temptation, teasing and charming those around you. The 50ml Eau de Parfum bottle is an elegant testament to the luxurious experience that awaits you. With its refined design, it complements the richness of the fragrance within, enhancing the overall indulgence. Choco Musk isn't just a fragrance; it's a captivating tale of sweet temptation. Let it be your daily indulgence, a sensory journey into the heart of dessert-inspired luxury.

products.product_name: Swiss Arabian Layali Rouge - Luxury Products From Dubai - Long Lasting Personal Perfume Oil Fragrance - A Seductive Signature Aroma - 0.5 Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
products.description: Layali Rouge has all the fun and frolics of a cocktail. Opening with sweet and juicy mango, pineapple, lemon, papaya and florals, the tropical opening sets the tone for the fabulous night ahead. The fruity notes are soon joined by a burst of hypnotic roses and juicy peaches, before hibiscus and coconut catch the breeze and bring it all to a rich night time finale. Niche perfumery is a state of mind. Its perfumes circumvent the laws imposed by marketing and fall outside of the traditional commercial channels. Artisan fragrances are not developed based on a marketing study conducted by commercial brands, but originate from the imagination and artistic sensibility of a perfumer. Enjoy our wonderfully unique, luxury personal fragrances, made with only the highest quality ingredients. At Swiss Arabian, our expertise and passion, our knowledge of legendary Arabian perfumery, oriental craftsmanship and contemporary elegance, all come together to create fragrances that capture your imagination and celebrate your true essence. The history of Swiss Arabian is an enchanting tale that spans over 40 years. This pioneer in Arabian perfumes was founded in the year 1974 by a visionary with a wealth of knowledge and a deep passion for perfumery. Today, Swiss Arabian is the first perfume manufacturer in the UAE. We operate five modern manufacturing facilities spread across an area of 165,000 sq. ft., producing more than 35 million perfumes annually and export to over 80 countries.
features: LAYALI ROUGE: YOUR NEW SIGNATURE SCENT. Opens with finest notes of Papaya and uplifting Lemon. The beating heart of the fragrance brings out the deep resonance of Peach and Rose. Coconut and Hibiscus add depth to the aroma and inspire attention.

INTENSELY CONCENTRATED PERSONAL AROMAS. A more traditional approach to perfumery from the Middle East. Experience our exquisite and exclusive range of handmade perfume oils in traditional attar style. For an intense and long lasting aroma projection.

PURE QUALITY, ALCOHOL FREE FORMULATION. Perfect for sensitive skin types, our alcohol-free perfume oils are hypoallergenic and won't irritate skin. These all natural, hand crafted oils are safe for all and feature expertly curated fragrance notes.

THE PERFECT MIX OF CULTURES AND PERFUMES. Carrying a legacy rooted in a blend of Western & Oriental craftsmanship, Swiss Arabian is a brand founded on duality that proudly celebrates the space in which two seemingly opposite worlds come together.

AN AROMATIC EXPERIENCE FROM ACROSS THE SEAS. Born from precious beginnings and built on achievements aplenty, our exquisite creations will lead you on an aromatic journey of the senses that culminates in an impeccable moment that enchants forever.

products.product_name: ALT. FRAGRANCES Crystal No. 23 Extrait de Parfum Unisex Perfume Inspired by Baccarat Rouge 540 Perfume 60ml

products.description:
ALT Crystal, inspired by the iconic Baccarat Rouge 540 perfume, is bold, unflinching, and designed to grab attention without compromise. Crystal features exotic notes of rich jasmine and saffron, combined with the warm tone of cedarwood and subtle amber gris. The result? A fragrance ideal for both work and play, with complex, multi-layered scents that adapt to your skin as day turns to night.
Whether you’re looking for an eau de parfum that’s strong, intoxicating, and creates an instant impact when you walk into a room or exploring sample perfumes for women, ALT Crystal 23 perfume for women and men is your perfect choice. Made in the USA, this unisex perfume is a natural choice for those who seek a scent that’s as versatile as it is captivating. Experience the essence of Maison Francis Kurkdjian's legendary Baccarat Rouge 540 perfume for men and women in every spritz of ALT Crystal 23.
Concentration: Extrait de Parfum.
Disclaimer: ALT. Fragrances competes with the designer brand. It does not use their fragrances and is not associated in any way with the designer brands or their manufacturers. All trademarks are property of their respective owners. The designer/brand name is solely used for comparison purposes and to give customers an idea of each fragrance's character and scent accords. We do not present our fragrances as exact copies. We are in compliance with the Federal Trade Commission's statement of policy regarding comparative advertising.
features: Inspired Creation: Crystal by ALT Fragrances is a testament to the ingenuity of its inspiration, by Francis K. Baccarat Rouge 540 perfume, offering a unique yet familiar olfactory experience.

Layered Sophistication: Starting with a bold amber wood, transitioning to the sweet sophistication of jasmine and cedar, and finishing with a delightful candy floss-like sweetness, ALT Crystal 23 is an evolving aromatic journey, perfect as perfume samples for women and men.
Perfectly Balanced: ALT Perfume composition ensures a perfect balance of sweetness and lightness, making it an ideal fragrance for both intimate settings and broader social occasions.
High-Quality Long Lasting Fragrance: More than just a dupe, Crystal replicates the depth and spice of Baccarat Rouge 540 perfume with subtle nuances that make it a standout on its own.

Signature Scent: Embrace Crystal as your go-to fragrance, a perfect blend of luxury and affordability that allows everyone to experience the allure of a high-quality perfume. Discover the allure with ALT Crystal No 23 perfume for women and men.

Whether you’re freshening up post-workout or starting your day, this mist’s warm, sweet aura will draw compliments without ever being overpowering. It’s a clean beauty pick that lets you enjoy a luxurious scent without guilt or irritation – perfect for those with sensitive skin or anyone prioritizing clean ingredients. Its warm and sweet profile is comforting in cooler weather, yet uplifting and wearable any time of year. Embrace the “vanilla girl” trend with this multi-use mist that leaves you feeling cozy, confident, and irresistibly scented all day long.
features: Indulgent Island Vanilla Fragrance: Experience a deliciously warm, sweet gourmand vanilla aroma with hints of jasmine, vanilla orchid, sandalwood, and vetiver. products.description:

Ideal Mother's Day gifts for her. Tips: Avoid touching your nails after curing the top coat for 2 minutes to enhance the shine.
Easy Application and Good Tenacity:If you have sensitive skin, we recommend using this product in conjunction with Liquid Peel off Latex Tape. This tape minimizes direct skin contact with the gel, reducing the chance of allergic reactions. It also helps in achieving more precise nail art. Please note that Liquid Peel off Latex Tape is not included with this product and must be purchased separately.
Reminder: In low temperatures, the base coat may become clumpy or thick, which can cause the brush to break off inside the bottle. If this happens, please contact us for satisfactory after-sales service. Tip: There's no need to wipe off the tacky residue of the base coat, as it helps the color coat adhere longer to your nails.If you feel a burning sensation during curing, it is recommended to remove your hand from the lamp. Resume curing once the sensation returns to normal.
Tips for preventing nail surface peeling off:(1) Polishing of the nail surface: Polish the front, side and trailing edge of the nail until there are no reflective spots on the nail surface(2) Nail surface cleaning: It is recommended to use Nail dehydrator to remove oil and moisture from the nail surface(3)Lighting time: It is recommended that the lighting time for base Coat, Color Gel and Top Coat at least 60 seconds.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Nail Art & Polish > Nail Art Accessories > Rhinestones
products.description:
💎PACKAGE CONTENT -- The package includes 1 box with 24 grids, featuring a variety of colors, approx. 32000 pcs of 3mm bling-out resin rhinestones (Mixed-Color). 1 tweezers and 1 pickup pen are included for easily picking up of rhinestones. 3 B7000 adhesive jewels glue for jewelry making. The large amount will support you to fulfill a number of your wonderful DIY decoration ideas.
💎VIBRANT GEMS FOR CRAFTS -- Made of choice resin, these crystals are lightweight, durable, and economical. The AB coating is firmly combined on the outer surface of each rhinestone, which can have different color performances under different light or different refraction angles, providing long-lasting sparkle. Their perfect cutting facets, delicate and exquisite shine will make your handicrafts more dazzling and eye-catching.
💎B7000 CLEAR GLUE FOR GEMS -- Our B7000 glue has strong adhesion and dries clear, non-toxic and harmless to the skin.The glue has a precision needle for easy application, initial cure time is 3-5 minutes and full cure time is 24 hours. The glue will have a slight overflow when first used, before use you can leave the glue head up for a few minutes to avoid overflow. After use, the needle needs to be wiped with an alcohol pad.
💎WIDE APPLICATION -- These sparkling iridescent resin rhinestones are perfect for creating dazzling looks. Use them for bedazzling crafts or nail art and more. Apply it to what you want to bling!
💎HIGHLIGHTS -- Our store also offers a variety of colors and sizes of resin rhinestones, these colors will give your crafts more possiblities, more shiny color scheme. A sufficient amount of resin gems are suitable for paving large area designs such as diamond paintings or cups. By choosing resin rhinestones with similar or contrasting colors, you can create color-coordinated or highly contrasting works, such as phone cases with gradient effect or colourful festival decorations.

products.product_name: BASED Hair Texturizing Powder, Lightweight & Volumizing Hair Styling Powder with Matte Finish, Add Texture to Hair with Medium Hold, For Short to Medium Hair, (1.69oz Bottle, 2.5 Gram Fill, Pack of 1)

products.description:
LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE POWDER: Unlike heavy gels or pastes, our Texture Powder is lightweight, volumizing and easy to apply. We formulated our powder to instantly add volume with a clean matte finish by absorbing any excess oil.
SHORT TO MEDIUM HAIR TYPE: To provide proper hold and volume, our texture powder is best for hair under 6 inches in length.
HOW TO USE: With your hand at least 2 inches from your head, apply 3-4 pumps of powder to dry hair. Use your fingers to evenly distribute the powder throughout your hair. If you need more hold, add some more product.
CONVENIENT SPRAY BOTTLE DESIGN: The spray bottle design allows you to get a consistent amount of powder every time. Simply take off the cap, pump, and style. No more making messes with shaker bottles.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Our Hair Texturizing Powder is 100% vegan and cruelty free. Made in The United States with no Sulfates, Parabens, or Phthalates. We only use 5 ingredients: Silica Silylate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Silica, Mica, & Maranta Arundinacea Root Extract so you know exactly what you’re putting in your hair.

products.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.
features: Clinical hair regrowth: Clinically proven to improve hair regrowth by 4x versus control at 16 weeks; unscented topical aerosol foam, 3-month supply, apply half-capful twice daily on scalp to regrow fuller, thicker hair and reverse hereditary hair loss.

Scalp conditioning technology: Tricho-Prime technology with botanical extracts and emollients conditions scalp and keeps follicles open; alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) exfoliates gently to enhance minoxidil absorption and support hair growth products.

Targeted thinning hair treatment: Minoxidil for men foam stimulates hair follicle activity and boosts hair protein production; formulated for men with general thinning at the top of the scalp to promote fuller, denser hair regrowth.

Easy daily application: Unscented, no-mess foam fits seamlessly into your hair care and hair growth routine; this 5% minoxidil topical hair loss treatment applies in a half-capful twice daily on clean, dry scalp for a full 3-month supply.

Brand trust and efficacy: From the #1 dermatologist-recommended Rogaine, this 5% minoxidil foam for men is clinically proven to reverse hereditary hair loss and deliver visible regrowth; scientifically validated in clinical studies.

products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce

products.description:

This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.description:
Salon-Quality Results at Home:Our High-Performance Hair Steamer Cap combines flame-retardant material with precise electronic temperature control, giving you professional deep conditioning without leaving your bathroom. Look and feel great while boosting your hair treatment—this heated cap takes your routine to the next level.
Upgraded for Thick, Curly Hair:Our hair steamer for deep conditioning Wider and longer than standard caps, it’s designed to fit thick, curly, or natural hair perfectly. The durable plastic lining (with a balanced double layer) maintains steady heat, while the adjustable cord strap fits any head size. Plus, it’s easy to clean—no hassle, just results.
Safe, Customizable Heat:This deep conditioning hair cap Choose from 10 temperature settings to match your comfort, and 3 timer modes (20-45 minutes) for optimal use. Our smart safety feature kicks in at 65°C (149°F)—it shuts off automatically, then restarts heating when temps drop to 45°C (113°F). Peace of mind, every time.
Deep Conditioning That Works:Prevent breakage and split ends with gentle, consistent heat that opens hair cuticles, helping your conditioner and treatments absorb deeper. The result? Softer, shinier hair that feels healthier from root to tip—ideal for all hair types.
Perfect for Home & Travel:Wide and deep enough to cover roots, ends, and edges, this compact cap fits easily in small spaces at home. Lightweight and portable, it’s also a travel essential—never skip your deep conditioning routine, even on the go.

products.description:
Trust the #1 Electric shaver brand¹ and choose Philips Norelco Shaver 22400 Series: wet and dry electric shaver that gives you a fast, clean shave, even on sensitive skin.
 
 Its 27 self-sharpening ComfortCut Blades have a 2-year lifetime which makes your shaver perform like new every day. They cut each hair right above skin level for a smooth finish, while the 4D Pivot & Flex Heads follow your facial contour, protecting it from nicks and cuts. The blades are made from hypoallergenic steel to resist corrosion, prevent impurities, and protect your skin. 
 
 Shave wet or dry and take care of defining your mustache or sideburns with the pop-up trimmer. Clean the device at the touch of a button with one-touch open to easily rinse under the tap. 
 
 A durable NiMH battery provides 40 minutes of shaving time on a single 1-hour charge. A 5-minute quick charge gives you enough power for one shave when in a hurry. Charge with a USB-A charging cable (power adapter not included). 
 
 ¹ Source: Euromonitor International Limited, retail value RSP, per body shavers category definition, 2022 data, research conducted in December 202

products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Each twin pack includes two 25-count packs (50 wipes total) for daily convenience at home or on the go. These makeup remover wipes feature a triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and conditioned with no heavy residue and no need to rinse. Designed for sensitive skin and gentle on the delicate eye area, these face cleansing wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. The wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, soaps, alcohols, or dyes, making them suitable for all skin types. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.

products.description:
Nourishing Face Moisturizer — Enhance your anti-aging skincare routine with this moisturizing face cream and facial moisturizer, designed to help your skin feel smooth and refreshed. Collagen supports skin's flexibility while promoting a firmer texture for both face and neck. Enjoy a youthful glow with a gentle solution that provides enduring hydration and care, ideal as a hydrating face moisturizer.
How to Use – Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin, massaging until absorbed. Start 1–2 times a week for sensitive skin, then increase as needed. Use daily for optimal results. Always apply SPF 30+ during the day, as retinol may heighten sun sensitivity. Perform a patch test before initial use. Consult a dermatologist before use. Individual sensitivity to components is possible.
Advanced Retinol Face Cream – Formulated with a balanced concentration of retinol, this moisturizer encourages skin renewal for a smoother, refreshed appearance. Hyaluronic acid complements retinol to help maintain hydration, leaving skin feeling soft and nourished without tightness. This product complements your collection of facial skin care products and daily beauty products.
Proudly Made in the USA – SimplyVital guarantees exceptional quality in each jar. We carefully select effective yet gentle components to create potent formulas, ensuring your skin gets the attention it deserves while enhancing your natural elegance. Also effective as a facial firming cream and supportive of neck firming and tightening when used daily on targeted areas.
Comprehensive Skincare for All – Designed for both men and women, this cream also serves as a men’s face moisturizer and face moisturizer for men, offering flexibility in any routine. It may be used in place of skin firming and tightening lotion or alternated with it, making it a smart addition to your skincare routine.

products.description:
【Non-Slip Handle】The handle comes with two sections of long anti-slip textured rubber, easy and reliable to grasp or hold anywhere along its length in hand in a wet and soapy condition during a bath. Protected by US patent.
【Lightweight & Non-Mold】More than 20% lighter than other wooden back brushes, much easier to maneuver and hold. Many customers told us wooden body scrubbers mold easily. Thus plastic is used as the handle material, sturdy and hard to go moldy owing to features of plastic: low density, high strength and waterproof.
【Long Handle, Cover More】Long handle allows you to cover hard-to-reach spots such as back, lower leg and feet, no need to bend to wash these areas anymore. Overall length is 17.1 inches, “Lifesaver” for bath and shower.
【Stiff & Soft】Natural stiff bristles on one side and soft nylon bristles on the other. The stiff side can be used to scrub legs, feet and other insensitive areas of the body in the shower or for dry brushing to exfoliate skin, soft nylon bristles lather up well and can be used for bath brushing to clean and soften skin or gentle exfoliation. Sensitive Skin Warning: Recommend patch test before full use.
【What You Get】Included with a hanging rope in the package. Please hang the brush to dry after use for longer lifespan.

products.description:
EXCELLENT QUALITY - Our glitter sweetheart speckle patches are made with attention to detail and quality. These glitter make up patches are gentle for all skin types because they are made of high-quality materials. With our glitter makeup patches, say goodbye to concerns about skin reactions and hello to gorgeous, glowing skin.
EASY TO APPLY - Applying our Fazit facial glitter speckle patches is effortless! Remove the backing by peeling it off, then apply the sticky side to your skin. After that, dampen a towel and apply pressure to the patch for sixty seconds. When the make up patch is finally removed, reveal your gorgeous new glitter speckles. It's easy - no mess, no fuss, just natural-looking glitter cosmetic speckles in minutes. Ideal for those wanting to enhance their look with a touch of glitter sparkle!
LONG-LASTING EFFECT - With our makeup glitter speckle patches, you can up your beauty game and look flawless from dawn to dusk. These cosmetic glitter patches blend perfectly with your skin, maintaining your speckled appearance all day. Our glitter face patches give you the power to look gorgeous and radiant for hours on end, whether attending a party or another event. You can rely on our speckle patches to deliver gorgeous fairy makeup every time.
FLEXIBLE APPLICATION - With our sweetheart glitter speckles, you can express your creativity to the fullest. These glitter paint patches subtly improve your appearance and are ideal for special occasions, concerts, beach days, and music festivals. Their adaptability goes beyond usual face paint makeup, which makes them perfect for enhancing your natural beauty for daily wear. Embrace the flexibility to express who you are with our versatile face paint glitter speckles.
WATER RESISTANT - Our face makeup speckles redefine beauty with their unique water-resistant feature. These precisely crafted waterproof glitter patches offer a seamless solution for speckle facepaint makeup fans. Our glitter make up patches stay in place and retain their brilliant color and flawless finish whether you're hitting the gym, enjoying a day by the pool, or enduring inclement weather. Take pleasure in flawless, long-lasting looks despite obstacles related to water.

products.description:
Peel-off lip stain masque that lasts all day. Wonder Blading Peel and Reveal locks in color for a matte nude finish: waterproof, smudge proof so you skip touch-ups through drinks, meals, commutes, and workouts.
Matte nude lip stain and lip tint powered by Wonder Blading technology (Liquid Blading) fuses pigment into the top lip layer for locked-in color—no feathering, fading and budge-free. Long lasting, high-pigment, non-drying, kiss-proof wear with clean edges
1-Step Stain & Go - Achieving a low-maintenance, long-wear look has never been easier with our Lip Stain Masque. Apply the Lip Stain Masque and let it set for 10 - 30 seconds, then wipe away with a damp towel or tissue. You’ll be left with a natural lip stain that won’t budge or fade throughout the day, even when eating or drinking.
Buildable Lip Stain or Lip Liner Stain - Wear it all over for bold color or apply just to the edges as a lip liner stain. Re-apply for more vibrance, then remove easily with any oil-based makeup remover.
13 Universally Flattering Shades - We offer the perfect shade for everyone and every occasion, including nude lip stain, pink lip stain, and even a bold red lip stain. Our lip tints are universally flattering, with soft fresh tints that suit any skin tone. And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

products.product_name: Wonderskin Lipliner Pencil - 360 Contour Lipliner, Long Lasting, Sharpenable, Waterproof and Transfer-Proof Brown Lip Liner Pencil (Saddle)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Lips > Lip Liners
products.description:
Versatile Lip Looks - With the 360 Contour Lip Liner, you have the power to create various lip looks. Use it as a traditional liner to define the contours of your lips, achieving a precise pout. Alternatively, explore your creative side by using it to contour the inside of your lips, creating ombre effects that add dimension to your smile. For a bolder statement, fill in your entire lip area with this versatile liner, transforming it into a lip color that speaks volumes.
Long Lasting Brilliance - Say goodbye to constant touch-ups. Our 360 Contour Lip Liner boasts impressive staying power, locking in place within seconds of application. Enjoy up to 6 hours (360 minutes) of vibrant color that stands up to the test of time. This liner is not just long-lasting; it's also waterproof, feather-proof, transfer-proof, and smudge-proof. Whether you're sipping drinks, enjoying a meal, or simply going about your day, your lip color will remain flawless.
TruGlide Technology - Applying lip liner has never been easier. Our TruGlide Technology sets this product apart. The formula harnesses advanced ingredients to create an ultra-creamy, tug-free, and soft-glide application. Say goodbye to the struggles of uneven application. With this liner, you can effortlessly lay down vibrant, rich color evenly, without the need for the precision of a makeup artist's hand.
Moisturizing Benefits - We understand that lip health is crucial. That's why we've infused our 360 Contour Lip Liner with the goodness of Cottonseed Oil and Jojoba. These ingredients not only provide intense color but also deliver moisturizing benefits with each application. Your lips will stay soft, supple, and hydrated throughout the day, ensuring both beauty and comfort.
Ethical Beauty Choice - At Wonderskin, we're committed to responsible beauty. Our 360 Contour Lip Liner is Vegan and Cruelty-Free, aligning with your ethical values and ensuring that no harm comes to animals during its creation. Moreover, this product is formulated without alcohol, mineral oils, BHT, and paraffins, further enhancing its reputation as a clean and conscientious beauty choice.

products.description: The Billion Dollar Brows 2-Piece Brow Buddy Contour Stencil Microblading Kit is the ultimate solution for achieving perfectly symmetrical and well-defined eyebrows. Whether you’re a professional or a beginner, this tool simplifies brow shaping by aligning with your unique facial features, ensuring precision every time. The Brow Buddy Tool guides you in marking the start, arch, and end points of your eyebrows, creating a seamless blueprint for shaping, waxing, or microblading. The included White Outlining Pencil allows for clear, visible markings, reducing guesswork and enhancing accuracy. Designed for all face shapes, this tool customizes the brow contour to complement individual features. Beauty professionals trust the Brow Buddy Kit for its patented design and ease of use, making it a must-have for those looking to perfect their brow game. Say goodbye to uneven brows and hello to flawless, professional-quality results with the Brow Buddy Contour Stencil Microblading Kit.

Built for Performance - High-quality materials support daily or professional use.
On-the-Go Ready - Compact enough for travel, strong enough for studio work.
Beginner-Friendly - Designed for ease without sacrificing precision or results.
Vegan and Ethical - Beauty you can trust—clean, cruelty-free, and safe.

products.product_name: ColourPop Best Besties Lip Pencil & Gloss Duo - Shimmery Nude Lip Combo for Definition & Shine - Includes Shades BFF 2 & It Girl (2 Count)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Sets
products.description: Achieve a shimmering 90s-inspired nude pout with the Best Besties Lip Pencil & Gloss Duo from ColourPop. This full-size set features the Lippie Pencil in BFF 2, a mid-tone warm brownish nude that applies with creamy, precision-defined pigment and sharpens for clean lines. Complementing this is Ultra Glossy Lip in It Girl, a golden nude gloss infused with hyaluronic acid to hydrate and visibly plump lips while delivering a glass-like finish that’s never sticky. Designed to layer effortlessly or stand alone, this limited-edition duo brings rich color payoff and high-shine luminosity in a single sweep. Cruelty-free and vegan, it’s thoughtfully formulated with Kakadu Plum and Japanese Sumac for lip-nourishing moisturization, ideal for beauty lovers seeking gloss and liner in one value-driven set. Whether dressing up for an evening out or just elevating everyday glam, Best Besties brings playful sparkle, hydration, and definition in one chic lip duo.
features: The Perfect Pair - A 90's shimmery nude lip combo featuring the bestselling shades of our Lippie Pencil and Ultra Glossy Lip Gloss, in BFF 2 and It Girl.
Lippie Pencil in BFF2 - Define (or overline) your lips with our long-lasting, creamy + sharpenable lip liner for the perfect pout.
Ultra Glossy Lip in It Girl - Prepare to be obsessed with our sheer hi-shine gloss made with Hyaluronic Acid for a hydrated, plump pout!

Application Tips - Apply Lippie Pencil to your lips by following your natural lip line! If you would like added coverage you can fill your entire lips in with the pencil. Finish with Ultra Glossy for a gorgeous, glossy finish.
Obsession-Worthy Beauty - We believe beauty should be fun, fearless, and accessible. That’s why we serve up trend-setting, cruelty-free formulas made for real life.

Blush: Apply blush to the cheeks and smudge for a fresh, vibrant look. products.product_name: Juvia's Place Palette The Warrior - Warm Golds, Browns & Bronzes, Shades of 9, Warm and Neutral Palette, Pigmented Makeup Palette Eye Color & Shine
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
VIBRANT EYESHADOW PALETTES: Juvia's Place believes in being fearless, bold, and proud. We created the Juvia's Place Eyeshadow Palettes to deliver rich, highly pigmented shades that are versatile on all skin tones, from dark to light. We have the colors you need to create vibrant eyeshadow looks, from soft and neutral to bold and dramatic.
RICHLY-PIGMENTED FORMULA: Our luxurious eyeshadow palettes feature a high level of color intensity, resulting in bold, vibrant shades that are easily visible on all skin tones. We provide a mix of mattes, shimmers, metallics, and glitter shades that are easy to blend, delivering a variety of ultra-pigmented eye makeup colors for all-day-every-day wearability.
HOW TO APPLY: Swipe your brush into the eyeshadow pans and tap off any excess product, or pack the brush for more pigmentation. Depending on the look you are going for, you can create a strong-colored lid or a softly blended base. When applying the colors go in a circular motion to blend the needed areas. Apply our Juvia's Place Eyeshadow Primer before applying your eyeshadow to avoid creasing and maximize wear and vibrancy.
GIFT IDEA: Our eyeshadow palettes are an excellent gift for anyone who enjoys wearing eyeshadow and wants to experiment with a variety of colors and finishes. Whether for a family member or a friend who appreciates beauty, makeup, and cosmetics, this eyeshadow palette will make a great makeup gift.
ABOUT US: Juvia's Place is a black-owned cosmetics company specializing in rich, colorful, and highly pigmented cosmetics. Chichi Eburu, our founder, designed a makeup collection for the eyes, lips, and face to proudly celebrate the African expression of beauty and honor the African origin of beauty.

products.product_name: Okerker Cool Toned Contour Palette with Mirror, Taupe Grey Contour Powder for Fair Pale Light Cool Toned Skin, Nose Contouring Bronzer Powder with Face Brush
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
-For Cool, Fair Skin: Why Does This Contour Look Naturally Shadow-like? Formulated with authentic ash-grey powders specifically for cool/neutral fair complexions, this palette mimics real bone structure shadows. It neutralizes unwanted redness and refuses to turn orange or muddy, solving the mismatch of warm-toned contours on your skin to create a naturally sculpted look.
Is It Blendable? Will It Cake on Dry Skin or Slide Off Oily Skin? The skin-loving, blurring micro-powders feel silky-smooth. Whether you have dry skin (it lays down weightlessly without catching on flakes) or oily skin (it controls shine and lasts), it blends seamlessly for a boundary-free, professional definition that stays put all day.
Is It Suitable for Daily Office Makeup or Camera-Ready Looks? Designed with low-saturation grey undertones for a truly matte, skin-like finish. Sheer out for a subtle, "my-face-but-better" bone structure for daily commutes, or layer up for a sharply-defined, camera-ready sculpt—all achievable with this single palette.
Is the included brush easy to use? How to contour the nose and cheeks properly? Pair it with a contour brush (angled brush for precise nose contouring, round brush for quick cheek blending). Effortlessly master contouring—even beginners can pick it up quickly and achieve everything from natural shading to sculpted, dimensional looks with ease.
- What are the features and uses of this makeup palette? This is a versatile makeup palette for contouring, eyeshadow, brows, and hairline. Its highly pigmented matte powder delivers a flawless, dimensional finish. For a natural look, apply lightly due to its high pigment concentration.

The wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, soaps, alcohols, or dyes, making them suitable for all skin types. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. products.description: PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash is the Number One Best-Selling Acne Wash in the U.S.* (*data on file). Clear, treat, and prevent even the worst breakouts with PanOxyl 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Maximum Strength Acne Foaming Wash. This cleanser for acne-prone skin can be used on both the face and body. This daily antimicrobial cleanser contains 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, the highest concentration available without a prescription. This powerful daily face and body wash starts working quickly to clear acne and kills over 99% of acne-causing bacteria in 15 seconds (*Independent lab study, data on file). This treatment for pimples effectively penetrates pores, killing the bacteria that cause acne to clear existing acne blemishes and preventing new blemishes from forming. products.description: There’s one essential step for achieving smooth skin that shouldn’t be overlooked: exfoliation. So, gently buff away dry, dull skin while caring for your skin with Dove Brown Sugar and Coconut Butter Exfoliating Body Scrub. Made with moisturizing cream, this gentle exfoliating body scrub restores skin’s nutrients as it exfoliates, leaving your skin feeling silky smooth. Try Dove Body Scrub to get beach-ready skin, prep skin for tanning, or to help exfoliate before shaving to help prevent ingrown hairs. You'll love the feeling of silky smooth skin all over. Plus, when you buy Dove, you can be assured you’re caring for your skin with products that are PETA Cruelty-Free certified. Company-wide, we’re also on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look—reaching over a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We’re also committed to substantially reducing plastic waste by 2025. This includes reducing our use of virgin plastic by 20,500 metric tons annually, launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles and trialing new refillable formats for certain select products.

products.product_name: Hearth and Homestead: Handmade Whipped Tallow Balm (Unscented/Herb-Infused) - Organic Body Butter with Infused Olive Oil, for Eczema, Rosacea, Baby - 1.3 oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Body > Moisturizers > Body Butters
products.description:
DO IT LIKE GRANDMA DID: Tallow--or rendered beef fat--is ancestral skincare. Our ancestors relied almost solely on animal fats to moisturize, protect, and heal their skin. Enjoy our light, meltable, whipped tallow balm as a contemporary nod to the practice of our forefathers.
ECZEMA "IT" BALM: Tallow is rich in vitamins A,D,E,K and B1 and plentiful fatty acids; while our herb-infused olive oil is high in polyphenols and antioxidants. This yields a balm that is nourishing to your skin and provides a protective barrier that's better than petroleum products as it is both breathable and absorbable. For people who want real results for their eczema, psoriasis, or dry skin, this is your "it" product.
SOURCING: We source our tallow from USA small farmers who practice regenerative agriculture. This means that they rotationally graze their cows all year long, never feeding anything other than grass. These healthy, happy cows create a beautiful, golden yellow fat that contains high levels of vitamins and minerals. Our suet is hand-rendered by our skilled team before it is scent-approved and then used in our tallow formula, crafted by hand in small batches.
MILD, CLEAN AROMA: Some tallow balms out there stink like the dickens. We are proud to offer a tallow that smells only lightly buttery upon opening--not beefy or off-putting. Enjoy clean, natural skincare without smelling like a steak (if that's not what you were looking for...).
ABOUT OUR PROCESS: At Hearth and Homestead, we are a small, family-owned business that holds to high standards for every single ingredient we put in our products. We use only high quality essential oils, butters, fats, herbs, and spices. We never use artificial ingredients like micas, dyes, or artificial fragrances.

products.description: Vanicream Gentle Body Wash for Sensitive Skin Vanicream Gentle Body Wash is a mild, non-irritating cleanser crafted specifically for those with sensitive or easily irritated skin. Helps remove dirt and oil without stripping away natural moisture, leaving skin feeling clean, soft, and calm after every use. Formulated without harsh surfactants, it’s suitable for both daily showers and hand washing. Vanicream pH balanced body wash contains no soap, sulfates, gluten, dyes, lanolin, parabens, formaldehyde releasers or botanical extracts, common irritants that can trigger skin reactions. A gentle option for the whole family.  Dermatologist-tested and accepted by the National Eczema Association, this gentle formula contains ingredients that are essential components of the skin and benefit all skin types. Apply to wet pouf, washcloth, or hands; lather, rinse, and pat dry. For best results, apply any Vanicream Moisturizer (sold separately) after bathing. Trust Vanicream, the #1 Dermatologist Recommended Brand for Sensitive Skin*, for your family's skincare needs. With over 50 years of expertise, our primary purpose is to make products for people with sensitive skin. *Source IQVIA ProVoice Survey, 12 months ending July 2024. Packaging may vary.

products.product_name: COSRX Pink Peptides Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles, Under Eye Mask, 60 Under Eye Patches, Korean Skin Care
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Masks
products.description:
Say goodbye to puffiness and hello to youthful eyes!: The Peptide Collagen Eye Patches, enriched with 4 powerful peptides and collagen, work to reduce puffiness, hydrate, and revitalize your under-eye area, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.
Clinically Tested: Based on Clinical Tests, the Patches were confirmed to help reduce puffiness by 25%, improve hydration by 68%, and improve firmness by 17% on the under eyes with one use. *Eye Irritation and Sensitive Skin Irritation Tested.
Key Ingredients: 4 Peptides, Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cyanocobalamin work together to help firm, depuff and provide volume to the under eyes.
How to Use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed. Two ways Usage : 1. Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your nose. 2. Crow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.*Tips for Applying: Remove excess essence to prevent from slipping, and gently press patches to secure in place.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

MOISTURIZING HEAD AND FACE BALM: Mountaineer Brand’s hydrating head and facial balm is a conditioning treatment that is formulated with a special blend of botanical ingredients to help revitalize dry skin and scalp. Leaves skin smooth, soft, and feeling healthy.

products.description: The products in this Bio-Oil trial kit are Bio-Oil Skincare Oil (2 oz), Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel (1.7 oz), and Bio-Oil Body Lotion (5.9 oz). Made for all skin types, this Bio-Oil Skincare Oil can be used to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks, scars, and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy, and more. Its fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores. It helps the skin to retain essential moisture to soften skin and provide dry skin relief. It's truly a multiuse oil that's recommended by skin care specialists. Try Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel to combat irritating dry skin and experience full body skin hydration. Our unique formula targets the top layer of skin to protect the moisture layer and soothe the skin. Bio-Oil’s specialist dry skin formula is easily absorbed by the skin and is composed of only 3 percent water. Our body oil for dry skin helps the skin to retain moisture. This product is suitable for dry and very dry skin types. The Bio-Oil Body Lotion is thinner than majority of currently available body lotions and has on average 2X the amount of oil. Our high-oil formula is infused with Shea Oil, Rosehip Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamins E & A. Bio-Oil Body Lotion hydrate and replenishes mild everyday dry skin, helping maintain the skin’s natural moisture balance.

products.description:
Burt's Bees Beeswax Lip Balm instantly softens and hydrates your lips to help prevent dryness, cracking or chapping. Infused with responsibly sourced beeswax and vitamin E to richly moisturize and soothe lips, this lip balm will make your lips juicy, happy and healthy. A matte finish keeps your lips their natural color, while the tint-free tube of lip moisturizer glides on smoothly to pamper dry lips while keeping them protected and hydrated. A final hint of peppermint oil provides that one-of-a-kind refreshing tingle. Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, this flavored lip balm is 100% natural origin to rejuvenate and beautify chapped lips with clean ingredients. You can conveniently tuck a tube of this moisturizing lip balm into your pocket or purse to keep natural, nurturing lip care at your fingertips. Playing by natures rules since 1984, Burts Bees uses ingredients from nature to nourish and revitalize your skin and lips, making products that have become a staple of your household. Burts Bees is the No. 1 dermatologist-recommended natural skin care brand (1). (1) Based on a September 2021 NielsenIQ national survey of U.S. Dermatologists.
By Burt's Bees
features: FLAVORFUL LIP BALM: Four 0.15 oz. lip balm tubes of Burt’s Bees Beeswax Lip Balm to moisturize and soften your lips
MOISTURIZED LIPS: Each balm is infused with responsibly sourced beeswax, vitamin E and nourishing oils for a conditioning lip treatment that keeps your lips happy, healthy and juicy
PEPPERMINT FLAVOR: A hint of peppermint oil gives a one-of-a-kind refreshing tingle that will encourage you to apply this flavored lip balm over and over again
NOURISH DRY OR CHAPPED LIPS: The tint-free tube of moisturizing lip balm glides on your lips smoothly to nourish them, keeping lips happy, healthy and hydrated
CONDITIONING LIP THERAPY: This lip moisturizer leaves your lips smooth and refreshed with a matte finish from clean ingredients
NATURAL ORIGIN: Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, this 100% natural origin lip balm revitalizes and beautifies your lips with clean ingredients to moisturize worry-free

products.description: Find long-lasting moisture from the #1 dermatologist recommended lip care brand with Aquaphor Lip Repair Sticks. Aquaphor Lip Repair immediately relieves dryness and soothes very chapped, cracked lips. Specifically formulated for sensitive lips and very dry chapped lips, this moisturizing lip balm seals in moisture and provides effective, long-lasting relief, so lips look and feel healthier. Formulated with a special combination of nourishing vitamins, moisturizers, Shea Butter, and Jojoba Oil, Aquaphor leaves lips feeling soft and comfortable. This lip balm multipack includes two Aquaphor lip balm sticks, so you can always have one nearby, to keep lips looking and feeling their best. Aquaphor Lip Repair Stick glides on easily, and is great for use in dry, cold or windy conditions. Apply Aquaphor Lip Repair Balm liberally to dry lips as often as needed. Each of the ingredients in Aquaphor skincare products are tested and approved for their quality and safety.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Lip Care > Balms & Moisturizers
products.description: Developed with Dermatologists & Plastic Surgeons, RoC Derm Correxion® Lip Volumizer is a non-invasive, topical lip treatment. Inspired by lip injections. Designed to visibly plump, smooth, and define lips in minutes and with continued use over time. The formula features 25% plumping ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid Filling Spheres that volumize on contact to deliver visible/the look of fullness in minutes plus up to 48 hours of deep hydration. RoC’s Pro-Collagen Peptide* helps improve the look of lip lines and supports more visibly defined contours for younger-looking lips. Dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, and suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, this non-sticky, non-drying formula is formulated without fragrance and without parabens, making it a smart choice for anyone concerned about irritation. A mild tingling sensation may occur on application; this is normal and a sign the formula is working.  Clinically proven results: in 3 minutes, 90% saw fuller, plumper lips*** and 48-hour hydration; in 1 week, 94% saw a visible boost in lip volume***; and in 4 weeks, subjects achieved a 2X improvement in visible volume**. *This formula does not contain collagen. It helps support skin’s natural collagen **Based on a clinical study at 1 & 4 weeks compared to baseline. ***clinical study with self-assessment
features: SKIN CARE INNOVATION: Our products, including this hydrating lip balm, are recognized by beauty industry leaders & dermatologists for their best-in-class effectiveness. We continue to research & innovate new formulas for healthier skin

SCIENCE & BEAUTY: We produce skin care products & treatments including moisturizers with SPF, lip repair treatment, cleansers, vitamin C serums, retinol skin tone & wrinkle regimens & creams for under eyes, neck firming, decollete & much more

LIP PLUMPING TREATMENT DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS: Achieve 48hr hydration, fuller lips, and enhanced color with this non-invasive topical peptide lip treatment. Works instantly and over time. Gentle enough for daily use by men and women

ANTI-AGING FORMULAS: Whether you're looking for plumper, more hydrated or voluminous lips, we have a formula that's right for you with this lip plumper serum. Dermatologist tested. Formulated Without Fragrance. Formulated Without parabens

CLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS: Made with 25% filling ingredients, Hyaluronic Acid Filling Spheres volumize for fullness and 48hrs hydration. 90% saw fuller lips in 3 mins, 2X volume in 4 weeks with this intense lip plumper
